name: AFL
0:
”Alexa, open A. F. L.”
”Alexa, ask A. F. L. to listen to the game.”
”Alexa, ask A. F. L. for the latest news.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a. f. l.
des:
Welcome footy fans! This is the all new official AFL skill, where we bring you into the action.
 
The AFL skill is better than ever before, with new enhanced features available only on Alexa. With our latest version of the AFL skill you can now listen LIVE to the games, ask for live stats, or catch up on the latest footy news.
 
And just like before, you can still ask Alexa for updates or info like the weekend results, who’s top of the ladder, your teams’ performance stats or even check in on the upcoming games schedule.
 
To get started, here’s some things to try with the AFL Skill:
 
"Alexa, ask AFL to listen to the game"
"Alexa, ask AFL to stream the game"
"Alexa, ask AFL did the Pies win?"
"Alexa, ask AFL for the latest news."
"Alexa, ask AFL who’s top of the ladder?"
"Alexa, ask AFL who won the Brownlow in 2007?"
"Alexa, ask AFL who's playing tonight?"
 
See you at the footy!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
